nodes.bodyText: moved to testing/stubs/resources-stub

New styling components/layout. Old, from reference-card.tsx
The {toDisplay(this.resourceType)} {fp.startCase(this.displayName)}  is referenced by the following datasets:   {fp.join(', ' , this.state.dataSetByResourceIdList.map((data) => data.name))} . Deleting the {toDisplay(this.resourceType)} {fp.startCase(this.displayName)} will make these datasets unavailable for use. Are you sure you want to delete {fp.startCase(this.displayName)} ?
Notebook names in resource actions are now uniform - no extension
we could just call this dataSet since that's the resource type that should always be passed in here right?
it's actually only Cohorts and Concept Sets, since these are what get referenced by Datasets.
nit: I think "render" better captures what is happening here versus "get"
can we also move get-resource-card in here? Since it seems like the place to place related functions.
That's what I had originally, but it makes a circular reference so I had to split it out.
Can this be combined with the real implementation above? It looks like this function is a superset of the functionality that's in the notebook file.
yes - the original reason for separating these is no longer valid
